file_content.text: You must be the one Lord Beniko and Agent Shan have brought to assist us!
Stop calling her Lord, droid! You know she hates that!
I'm showing respect, Jakarro. You could learn to do the same once in a while.
And you could learn to properly introduce us!
What? Oh--you are now in the presence of renowned illicit-transport specialist Jakarro. I am his translator, Ceetoo Deefour.
We are here under the direction of Lord--of Miss Beniko and Agent Shan--to assist you in your exciting campaign against the Nova Blades!
All right, then--what are we waiting for?
Let's get started.
We have been waiting for you!
Jakarro says he is pleased to get things underway!
What are you, local pirates or something?
You're their source?
Do not compare me to the sorry pirates on this backwater dump!
Jakarro wishes me to convey that we do not, in fact, live here.
You have me confused with someone who needs assistance.
I don't need help.
And you have me confused with a Wookiee who cares!
While Jakarro recognizes your obvious prowess, he would nevertheless prefer to lend a hand.
I understood every word he said.
Thank goodness! I hate having to reword his every foul utterance.
Watch it, droid! I can still drop what is left of you into an active volcano!
What Jakarro lacks in manners, he makes up for in heart, and he would very much like revenge on the Revanites, who hired and then betrayed him. As would I.
To that end, we plan to start by taking apart the Revanites' allies by firing from Jakarro's ship on the targets of your choosing.
It's you! It's really you! I can hardly believe my optical circuits!
Jakarro and Deefour. I was hoping I hadn't seen the last of you.
Good to see you two.
It is good to see you, too, Sith!
Welcome to Rishi, my lord. Not exactly the paradise we'd hoped it would be....
The chumps who pass for pirates in this place are a joke! I like the bird ones, though.
It is good to see you, too, bounty hunter!
And may I thank you for not taking advantage of yet another bounty on our heads.
You could make some serious credits if any of the chumps who pass for pirates in this place have markers on them! Easy pickings!
It is good to see you, too, spy!
Oh, just broadcast it, why don't you! Big lug. Do you not know what "undercover" means?
I would not worry--the pirates here barely understand anything about anything!
I had a feeling Lana and Theron were talking about you when they said they had help. A bad feeling.
Not you two....
Always willing to put down others--I like you! The chumps who pass for pirates in this place, on the other hand....
Jakarro, I don't think I can take any more flapping out of that synthesized yap.
Shut him up.
The droid keeps me from becoming too relaxed on this boring backwater. He stays on!
All bluster aside, this planet's inhabitants are not to be trifled with. The Nova Blades in particular are a powerful and organized group.
That is why we intend to depower and disorganize them by firing from Jakarro's ship on the targets of your choosing.
They see me causing trouble and word gets out that the Howling Tempest Gang is coming for the Nova Blades.
Sounds good.
Precisely! It's nice to not have to explain everything for a change.
Watch it, droid!
If we're using a ship, we could take out their entire depot.
Why be so precise?
If you are to be implicated as the perpetrator of these acts, you must be seen flagging their assets.
If you miss, you make me look bad. Don't miss.
Don't you dare fail me.
With your guidance, we couldn't possibly miss!
Here. The sooner we finish making a mark with the Nova Blades, the sooner we can get at the Revanites!
I'd wish you good luck if I thought you'd need it. We'll keep in touch!
At last! You should know by now that it isn't wise to keep the mighty Jakarro waiting!
Must you complain so loudly, master? There could be ruthless pirates or hungry wildlife all around us! Hearing us! Smelling us!
I'm glad to see you're still helping us out. We need all the allies we can get.
It's good to see you again.
You've got that right.
You should watch out for cannibals, too. Apparently that's actually a problem around here.
Watch out for cannibals, too.
Well, I think I'm safe on that account, at least. Hopefully.
I was sure that Theron and Lana would have gotten rid of you by now.
Not you two again.
Ha! They would be long dead without my wisdom to guide them.
This is my life....
Theron and Lana got the little Jedi they were hoping for! Now we can finally get to work.
You must be the soldier. From all of Theron and Lana's talk, I thought you'd be taller at least.
At last, a star captain of some reputation! The rest of this planet's scum are amateurs at best.
Allow me to present my master, the noted transport specialist Jakarro! And I am Ceetoo-Deefour, former translator to her majesty, Queen--
Shut up, droid! Nobody cares about you.
We're pretty short on allies right now. I'll be glad to have your help.
Pleasure to meet you both.
You see, Jakarro? There are people with manners on this planet after all!
How did you two get mixed up in all of this?
Why help us?
The Revanites hired us for a job, then betrayed, tortured, and threatened to kill us!
Is that why you're... in pieces?
No, that was for speaking out of turn. Always.
I want to see the Revanites ruined as much as you and your other tiny friends do. Now can we get on with it?
You're an... interesting pair.
I don't even know what to say.
How kind of you!
Now, are we going to destroy these Revanite-loving scum-eaters, or are we going to stand out in the heat all day?
Theron and Lana said you'd have a plan?
Yes. You will mark targets in the supply cache. I will be circling in my ship nearby. When a target is marked, I will blast it to bits!
You mean... we don't have to go charging in face-first this time? We're staying in the ship? Oh, thank you master, thank you!
Quit blubbering, droid! Don't forget the rest!
Oh, yes... please make sure it's clear that this was the work of the Red Hulls. We need to keep up appearances, after all!
Very well. Let's get started.
Understood. Ready to move?
Sure thing. You two ready?
Yes! Good hunting!
